lead_paragraph: The owners of Newsmax and Thane Ritchie, an Illinois hedge fund manager, are reported to have been rejected by the Washington Post Company.
snippet: The owners of Newsmax and Thane Ritchie, an Illinois hedge fund manager, are reported to have been rejected by the Washington Post Company.

headline.main: 2 Suitors for Newsweek Are Said to Be Ruled Out
headline.seo: 2 Suitors for Newsweek Are Said to Be Ruled Out
headline.print_headline: 2 Suitors for Newsweek Are Said to Be Ruled Out
